description:
Seeking a DH or XC brake upgrade? Look no further. Lightweight, low profile and ridiculously powerful, XTs are some of the most popular hydraulic brakes in the world. With ergonomic dimpled levers, tool-free reach adjustment and amazing feel, XTs nail both form and function. Internally, they feature an aluminum master cylinder for improved modulation at fewer grams. 2-piston calipers with oversized ceramic pistons and super-tech finned metal pads efficiently dissipate heat, so you can brake later and harder with way less fade.

  • Ergonomically designed dimpled levers with tool-free reach adjustment
  • Redesigned lever assembly makes more contact with your handlebars for improved rigidity
  • Servo Wave mechanism reduces rotor drag without affecting lever feel or modulation
  • Aluminum master-cylinder is powerful and lightweight
  • Hinged handlebar clamp for easy installation
  • Compact inline barrel reservoir
  • 2-piston caliper is forged/machined aluminum
  • Oversized ceramic pistons assist heat management
  • Includes J04C metal brake pads with integrated air cooling fins for improved stopping power under heavy braking
  • Alloy banjo tubing attachment
  • Designed only for use with Shimano brand mineral oil
  • Rotors and adaptors sold separately
name: Shimano Deore M8100 XT Disc Brake Assembled Kit
